item.title: Catalytic Resonance Theory: Forecasting the Flow of Programmable Catalytic Loops
item.description:
Madeline A. Murphy, Kyle Noordhoek, Sallye R. Gathmann, Paul J. Dauenhauer, Christopher J. Bartel, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4405892021
Chemical transformations on catalyst surfaces occur through series and parallel reaction pathways. These complex networks and their behavior can be most simply evaluated through a three-species surface reaction loop (A*...
item.author: Madeline A. Murphy, Kyle Noordhoek, Sallye R. Gathmann, Paul J. Dauenhauer, Christopher J. Bartel
